verbs.description: It [V: appears] [ARG1: that the summit between President Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un has resulted in legitimacy for Kim 's dictatorship , and nothing for world peace] .
It appears that the summit between President Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un [V: has] resulted in legitimacy for Kim 's dictatorship , and nothing for world peace .
It appears that [ARG1: the summit between President Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] has [V: resulted] [ARG2: in legitimacy for Kim 's dictatorship , and nothing for world peace] .
